title: In June 2014, Ashley Withers reported that there were no future plans for the Coast Guard Station on River Road. However, here we are in Feb 2016 and we see Bulldozers moving lots of earth and surveyors working all over the site, perhaps you can enlighten us on what is happening ? Thank you.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/03/what-were-the-bulldozers-and-surveyors-doing-recently-around-the-coast-guard-station-on-river-road/
